EmailTemplate.description: DuPont™ Answer Request for additional technical information on Kevlar®
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar® Technical Guide
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® Technical Guide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar®.
Attached you will find a link to a more comprehensive technical overview of the Kevlar® products to support your request for technical information. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Kevlar/en_US/assets/downloads/KEVLAR_Technical_Guide.pdf
Please continue to visit out DuPont websites which provides additional information about Nomex® or Kevlar® as well as other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
